tool_description: Analyzes agency responses to FOIA requests, categorizing response types, identifying exemptions used, and extracting key information.

response_text.description: Full text of the agency response

error_messages: Empty response text: Provide the complete text of the agency response.
Invalid date format: Use ISO 8601 date-time format for original_request_date.
Response parsing failed: The response format is not recognized or corrupted.
usage: Provide the complete response_text from the agency, along with agency_name and original_request_date. Optionally include tracking_number for reference. Returns detailed analysis of the response.

response_type.description: Category of response: full_grant, partial_grant, full_denial, referral, no_records

exemptions_cited.description: List of FOIA exemptions cited in denials

pages_released.description: Number of pages released to requester

pages_redacted.description: Number of pages released with redactions

appeal_deadline.description: Deadline for filing an appeal if applicable

appeal_recommended.description: Whether an appeal might be worthwhile based on analysis
